item.title: Templating mermaid diagrams and other files
item.description: Related mustache templating processor // Bodacious Blog Summary I would like to place lengthy strings into mermaid diagram nodes, but I don’t want to worry about escaping characters or formatting the text. The problem I’m trying to solve is that a simple string substitution is not enough for many formats, including mermaid files. There may be some additional transformation that needs to be applied to the string before it goes into the file.
